title: Experience-Based Strategy Workshop for Creative Language Learning

context.additional_context: Aimed at strengthening practical language skills applicable to workplace settings for professionals.

learning_goals: Students can use 20 essential expressions per professional field through role-play activities based on real work scenarios.
Students can develop and apply at least three creative problem-solving strategies reflecting peer feedback to language use contexts.
Experience-based collaborative projects achieve over 30% improvement in work-related communication skills.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
